headline: Amcor (AMCR) Delivers Strong EPS and Synergy Gains After Berry Merger, Truist Reiterates Buy
summary: Amcor plc (NYSE:AMCR) ranks among the best undervalued European stocks to buy now. Following Amcor plc (NYSE:AMCR)’s quarterly earnings report, Truist Securities reiterated its Buy rating and $60 price target for the company on February 5. Amcor plc (NYSE:AMCR) posted adjusted earnings per share of $0.86, which surpassed both Truist’s forecast of $0.79 and the […]

headline: Palantir Technologies (PLTR) Soars as AI Pure-Play, Truist Reaffirms Buy
summary: Palantir Technologies Inc. (NASDAQ:PLTR) ranks among the best innovative stocks to buy according to Wall Street analysts.
